abstract: Igor V Plotnitsky, Russian-backed leader of self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic in eastern Ukraine, is seriously wounded in assassination attempt after bomb detonates and destroys car in which he was traveling.
lead_paragraph: A blast tore apart a car carrying Igor V. Plotnitsky, the president of the self-proclaimed Luhansk People’s Republic.
snippet: A blast tore apart a car carrying Igor V. Plotnitsky, the president of the self-proclaimed Luhansk People’s Republic....

headline.main: Bomb Wounds Russian-Backed Leader of Ukraine Separatist Region
headline.print_headline: Bomb Injures  a Rebel Chief  in Ukraine
